name: Spider-Man

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.details: Shoots webbing that slows enemies. Multiple hits can briefly immobilize ('Webbed').

abilities.name: Web Swing
abilities.details: Classic web-swinging for high mobility across maps.

abilities.name: Web Zip
abilities.details: Quickly zips towards a targeted location.

abilities.name: Web Grenade?
abilities.details: Throws a grenade that explodes, applying Web effect in an area.

ultimate.name: Web Blossom
ultimate.effect: Leaps into the air and rapidly shoots webs in all directions, heavily webbing nearby enemies.
ultimate.details: Goes all out with his web shooters for area denial and control.

passives.name: Spider-Sense
passives.details: Provides a visual indicator when targeted by enemy attacks or abilities.

passives.name: Wall Crawling
passives.details: Can stick to and crawl on any surface.

passives.name: Web Fluid
passives.details: Manages web fluid resource, which regenerates over time. Used by Web Shot and Web Swing.

lore: Peter Parker, bitten by a radioactive spider, gained incredible arachnid-like abilities. Balancing his life as a high school student (or adult) with being Spider-Man, he fights crime with great power and great responsibility.
